TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs Inherits InputEventArgs
public ref class ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::Input::InputEventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用对象来指定操作的延时行为。You can use the object to specify the inertial behavior of a manipulation. 您可以通过使用单独指定每种类型的操作的延时行为， ，和属性。You can specify the inertial behavior for each type of manipulation separately by using the , , and properties. 每个属性是一种类型的对象，表示惯性行为，每种情况下，您可以指定以下：Each property is a type of object that represents the inertial behavior and in each case, you can specify the following: - 惯性开始时初始速度。The initial velocity of the inertia when it begins. - 惯性结束时的操作所需的位置。The desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends. - 延时的预期的减速度。The desired deceleration of the inertia. 您通常指定惯性结束时的操作所需的位置或预期的减速度的延时，但不可同时使用两者。You typically specify either the desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends or the desired deceleration of the inertia, but not both. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件处理程序，并设置预期的减速度转换、 扩展和旋转惯性期间使用。The following example shows the event handler and sets the desired deceleration for translation, expansion, and rotation that is used during inertia. 此示例是在一个更大示例的一部分[演练： 创建应用的第一个触摸程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationinertiastarting)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationinertiastarting)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Cancel() cil managed

span.span: Cancels the manipulation.

returns.span: 如果成功取消操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the manipulation was successfully canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该方法成功，则默认发送上一个触摸事件作为鼠标按下、 鼠标移动、 或的鼠标弹起事件的元素和未来的操作事件不会发生。If the method succeeds, the default sends previous touch events as mouse down, mouse move, or mouse up events to the element and future manipulation events do not occur.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Input::InertiaExpansionBehavior ^ ExpansionBehavior { System::Windows::Input::InertiaExpansionBehavior ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Input::InertiaExpansionBehavior ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置延伸惯性运动减慢的速率。

span.span: Get or sets the rate of slowdown of expansion inertial movement.

value.span: 延伸惯性运动减慢的速率

span.span: The rate of slowdown of expansion inertial movement

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来执行以下操作：Use the property to do the following: - 它通过设置开始时指定延时的初始速度属性。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 通过设置惯性结束时指定操作的预期的延伸属性。Specify the desired expansion of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 通过设置来指定预期的减速度的延时属性。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 您通常设置或，但不可同时使用两者。You typically set either the or the , but not both. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 操作响应的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建应用的第一个触摸程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

The point from which the manipulation originated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果多个联系点启动操作，属性是所有的联系点之间的点。If more than one point of contact initiated the manipulation, the property is the point between all of the points of contact. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 操作响应的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建应用的第一个触摸程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置旋转惯性运动减慢的速率。

span.span: Gets or sets the rate of slowdown of rotational inertial movement.

span.span: The rate of slowdown of rotational inertial movement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来执行以下操作：Use the property to do the following: - 它通过设置开始时指定延时的初始速度属性。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 指定操作的所需的旋转，通过设置惯性结束时属性。Specify the desired rotation of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 通过设置来指定预期的减速度的延时属性。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 您通常设置或，但不可同时使用两者。You typically set either the or the , but not both. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 操作响应的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建应用的第一个触摸程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常不需要调用此方法。You typically do not need to call this method. 使用上的属性相反。Use the properties on the instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来执行以下操作：Use the property to do the following: - 它通过设置开始时指定延时的初始速度属性。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 指定操作的所需的位置，通过设置惯性结束时属性。Specify the desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 通过设置来指定预期的减速度的延时属性。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 您通常设置或，但不可同时使用两者。You typically set either the or the , but not both. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 操作响应的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建应用的第一个触摸程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
